page.title: 19INTERESTING PEOPLE-2
page.content: {Mr and Mrs Jackson}have lived in Condover since 1968.They came to Condover on their retirement.The Jacksons married in the West Indies during the second world war,and stayed there for 12 years.They lived on several islands including Aruba and Curacao.Then they moved to Holland. They lived there for 14 years.Mr and Mrs Jackson are very musical.Mrs Jackson plays the Organ,Piano and Recorder.18 years ago they began teaching young people to play the Recorder.Mr Jackson plays the Piano, Organ and Flute.Mr Jackson is secretary of the Shrewbury Organists Association.He is an active member of Condover Evergreens.Music plays a big part in Mr and Mrs Jacksons lives.
